text: Strawberry and Chocolate () is a 1993 Cuban Mexican comedy drama movie directed by Tomás Gutiérrez Alea and Juan Carlos Tabío and is based on the 1990 short story The Wolf, The Forest and the New Man by Senel Paz. It stars Jorge Perugorría, Vladimir Cruz, Mirta Ibarra, Francisco Gattorno and was distributed by Miramax Films. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1995. ==Other websites== * Category:1993 comedy-drama movies Category:1990s LGBT movies Category:Movies based on short stories Category:Cuban movies Category:Mexican comedy movies Category:Mexican drama movies Category:Mexican LGBT movies Category:Movies directed by Juan Carlos Tabío Category:Movies directed by Tomás Gutiérrez Alea Category:Movies set in the 1970s Category:Movies set in Cuba
title: Strawberry and Chocolate
